children.description: Click the 'Settings' link (visible in the Repositories section) to trigger the modal or panel for configuration changes.
Click the 'Actions' button to open the menu that provides additional options affecting repository management.
Click the 'Add repo' button to open the new repository form and change the application state by initiating repo creation.
Toggle the representative repository checkbox next to 'demo-app-1' to simulate selection/deselection and test state updates.
Click the 'All Repositories' button to activate the filter or view mode change for the repository list.
Use the search input in the repositories header (placeholder 'Search') to type a query and trigger any filtering behavior of the repository list.
Click the 'All Repositories' button in the repositories header to open or change repository filter or scope options.
